tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Nobody denies he has experience. The problem with Dr. Gray is that he gave up on teaching. His lectures are literally just him reading from a PowerPoint presentation where he has copy/pasted paragraphs/images from the book. Rarely, you can see a tiny teaching spark on topics related to his job.. but the learning atmosphere has long been dead.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: A man like Jeffery Gray only comes around once every century or so. His C++ class was very engaging, challenging, and rewarding. Seeing those words "Hello World" appear on the screen for the first time is an experience I\'ll never forget. Dr. Gray provides endless opportunities for you to improve your grades & really shows deep care for his students

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: He told us as a class, not to work problems out of the book because they would just confuse us. So instead he gave us a "test guide", it was all equations straight out of the text book which we were told not to use. He never assigned HW or gave example problems so it was impossible to study or prepare for the tests.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Horrible professor, all he did was write formulas down out of the book all class with no explanation. Everyone was forced to teach themselves and if you are brave enough to ask him a question be ready for an answer that he will try and embarrass you with in front of the class!

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: If your willing to put in about an hour a day for three days a week of serious studying you will make an A with this guy. Who cares if he dresses funky hes a good guy, pretty funny, and an excellent teacher.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Take him over the summer, his test are really easy. He knows the subject and is always willing to help you out. Don\'t bother with his look.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I have no idea what all these bad rating are. I think Dr.G was a great teacher. He\'s kind of funny too. And who cares what he wears! Uno\'s engineering school obviously doesn\'t not require much in fashion. If I had to guess, these ratings are from students he didn\'t like.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Horrible teacher, I received a B in the class but most of my learning was me teaching myself.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Looks homeless...holes in his clothes, long unkempt hair and beard. Doesn\'t teach well...teaches in a way not for you to learn, but for him to feel smarter than you...duh you are a PHD in EE
